reviewText: Firing Line with Bill Buckley is a rarity in political TV broadcasting. Guests to the show, typically political activist and intellectuals who held positions very much opposite to the host, were treated with respect and honest curiosity.
It's Buckley....how can you go wrong....His conservative view was and always will be an important source of quality information ...that is if you are a lover of liberty
Buckley interviews a person involved with pushing the Great Society that now seems to have some regrets.  A episode concerning government overreach.
